timeline.bodyText: Instead of adding a new constant that basically just adds the .jsf suffix to the value of DEFAULT_LINK in the prior line, it would be less redundant to just add that suffix to the existing constant and reuse it. DEFAULT_LINK is currently only used for the referrer URL parameter in some places, and for that purpose desktop.jsf works as well as just desktop.
